name: Documenting Solidity with diagrams
description: Learn how to generate visual diagrams that document your Solidity contracts including contract dependencies, external interfaces, internal workings and storage slots.

speakers.name: Nick Addison
speakers.bio:
Nick Addison is a Solidity developer at Origin Protocol. Previously, Nick has worked at mStable and Consensys as a Solidity developer.
Nick is the author of the open source sol2uml and tx2uml tools.
